軭字的基本解释

軭
kuāng
车轮扭曲。

軭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kuáng］
［《廣韻》巨王切，平陽，羣。］
亦作“軭1”。
缫轮。亦指手摇的缫丝车。

軭字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　軭； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1241第24
【廣韻】去王切【集韻】曲王切，?音匡。【說文】車戾也。　又【廣韻】巨王切【集韻】渠王切，?音狂。義同。

軭字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
軭字的起名意思

暂无。

軭
Basic explanation of words
軭
kuāng
The wheels are twisted.
軭
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [kuáng]
["Guangyun" Giant Wangqie, Pingyang, Qun. ]
Also known as "軭1".
Reeling wheel. Also refers to the hand-cranked silk reeling car.
軭
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Car Character Department] 　軭; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 1241 to 24
[Guang Yun] Go to Wang Qi [Ji Yun] Qu Wang Qi, and Yin Kuang. [Said the text] Che Hu also.　[Guang Yun] Giant King Cut [Ji Yun] Qu Wang cut, sound crazy. The same meaning.
